name: webpack-template
description: A reusable template for Webpack with Prettier and ESLint.

scripts.install-dependencies: npm install --save-dev eslint @eslint/js eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-prettier prettier globals webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server mini-css-extract-plugin css-loader sass sass-loader babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react file-loader html-webpack-plugin ignore-emit-webpack-plugin
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages

author: Josh Pablico
